|blank1_info = 1267624 |website = |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Ward is a town in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Moody County, and 34 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Towns in South Dakota
